original: vṛttiṃ vyadhāt trikarahasyavimarśagarbhāṃ kāśmīrikāc cukhalakād adhigamya janma //1 //
analyzed: vṛttim vyadhāt trika rahasya vimarśa garbhām kāśmīrikāt cukhalakāt adhigamya janma  /

original: etāvad etad iti kas tulayet prasahya śrīśāṃbhavaṃ matam anargalitāś ca vācaḥ /
analyzed: etāvat etat iti kaḥ tulayet prasahya śrī śāṃbhavam matam an argalitāḥ ca vācaḥ

original: etat tu tāvad akhilātmani bhāti yan me bhātaṃ tato 'tra sudhiyo na parāṅmukhāḥ syuḥ // 2 //
analyzed: etat tu tāvat akhila ātmani bhāti yat me bhātam sudhiyaḥ na parāṅmukhāḥ syuḥ  /

original: ajñasya saṃśayaviparyayabhāgino vā jñānaṃ prakamparahitaṃ prakaroti samyak /
analyzed: ajñasya saṃśaya viparyaya bhāginaḥ vā jñānam prakampa rahitam prakaroti samyak

original: rūḍhasya niścayavato hṛdayapratiṣṭhāṃ saṃvādinīṃ prakurute kṛtir īdṛśīyam //3// %
analyzed: rūḍhasya niścayavataḥ hṛdaya pratiṣṭhām saṃvādinīm prakurute kṛtiḥ īdṛśī iyam
etāvat artha rasa saṃkalana adhirūḍhaḥ dhārā adhirūdha hṛdayaḥ vimṛśet

original: yady uttaraṃ tad api naiva saheta nedaṃ sopānam etad amalaṃ padam ārurukṣoḥ //4//
analyzed: yadi uttaram tat api nā eva saheta na idam sopānam etat amalam padam ārurukṣoḥ

original: kasmīreṣu yaśaskarasya nṛpater āsīd amātyāgraṇīḥ śrīmān vallabha ity udāhṛtatanur yaḥ prāgryajanmā dvijaḥ /
analyzed: kasmīreṣu yaśaskarasya nṛpateḥ āsīt amātya agraṇīḥ śrīmān vallabhaḥ iti udāhṛta tanuḥ yaḥ prāgrya janmā dvijaḥ

original: tasya svāṅgabhavaḥ prasiddhipadavīpātraṃ samagrair guṇaiḥ śrīśauriḥ śiśucandracūḍacaraṇadhyānaikaratnākaraḥ //5//
analyzed: tasya sva aṅga bhavaḥ prasiddhi padavī pātram samagraiḥ guṇaiḥ śrī śauriḥ śiśu candracūḍa caraṇa dhyāna eka ratna ākaraḥ

original: śīlasyāyatanaṃ parasya yasaso jṛmbhāspadaṃ narmabhūr vātsalyasya samagralokakaruṇādharmasya janmasthitiḥ /
analyzed: śīlasya āyatanam parasya yasasaḥ jṛmbhā āspadam narma bhūḥ vātsalyasya samagra loka karuṇā dharmasya janma sthitiḥ

original: śrīmadvatsalikābhidhā sahacarī tasyaiva bhaktyullasatprodriktāntaravṛtti śaṅkaranutau yasyā mano jṛmbhate //6//
analyzed: śrīmat vatsalikā abhidhā sahacarī tasya eva bhakti ullasat prodrikta antara vṛtti śaṅkara nutau yasyāḥ manaḥ jṛmbhate
tasya eva ātmabhavaḥ vibhāvita jagat sarga sthitiḥ śaṅkara dhyāna arcā paricintana eka rasikaḥ karṇa abhidhānaḥ dvijaḥ

original: yo bālye 'py atha yauvane 'pi viṣayāsaktiṃ vihāya sthirām enām āśrayate vimarśapadavīṃ saṃsāranirmūlinīm //7//
analyzed: yaḥ bālye pi atha yauvane pi viṣaya āsaktim vihāya sthirām enām āśrayate vimarśa padavīm saṃsāra nirmūlinīm

original: bhrātā mamaiva śivaśāsanarūḍhacittaḥ prepsuḥ parātmani manorathaguptanāmā /
analyzed: bhrātā mama eva śiva śāsana rūḍha cittaḥ prepsuḥ parātmani manorathagupta nāmā

original: yaḥ śāstratantram akhilaṃ pravivektukāmaḥ prāptuṃ paraṃ śivapadaṃ bhavabhedanāya // 8//
analyzed: yaḥ śāstra tantram akhilam pravivektu kāmaḥ prāptum param śiva padam bhava bhedanāya
rāmadeva abhidhānaḥ ca bhūṣita uttama janmakaḥ
etat priya hita karaṇa prarūḍha hṛdayena yat mayā racitam
mārga pradarśanam tat sarvasya śiva āptaye bhūyāt
antarvedyām atrigupta abhidhānaḥ prāpya utpattim prāviśat prāgrya janmā
śrī kāśmīrān candracūḍā avatāvaiḥ niḥsaṃkhyākaiḥ pāvita upānta bhāgān
tasya anvavāye mahati prasūtāt varāhaguptāt pratilabdha janmā
saṃsāra vṛttānta parāṅmukhaḥ yaḥ śiva ekacittaḥ cukhala abhidhānaḥ
tasmāt vivecita samasta padārtha jātāt labdhvā api deha padavīm parameśa pūtām
prāpta abhayaḥ bhinavagupta pada abhidhānaḥ prāvesayat trika sa tattvam idam nigūḍham

original: ye tāvat pravivekavandhyahṛdayās tebhyaḥ praṇāmo varaḥ ke 'py anye praviviñcate na ca gatāḥ pāraṃ dhig etāñ jaḍān /
analyzed: ye tāvat praviveka vandhya hṛdayāḥ tebhyaḥ praṇāmaḥ varaḥ ke pi anye praviviñcate na ca gatāḥ pāram dhik etām jaḍān

original: yas tv anyaḥ pravimarśasārapadavīsaṃbhāvanāsusthito lakṣaiko 'pi sa kaścid eva saphalīkurvīta yatnaṃ mama //14//
analyzed: yaḥ tu anyaḥ pravimarśa sāra padavī saṃbhāvanā su sthitaḥ sa kaścid eva saphalīkurvīta yatnam mama

original: svātmānāṃ pravivektum apy alasatāṃ ye bibhrati prārthanā tān praty ātmakadarthanān na parataḥ kiṃcit phalaṃ soṣyate /
analyzed: sva ātmānām pravivektum api alasa tām ye bibhrati prārthanā tān prati ātma kadarthanāt na paratas kiṃcid phalam soṣyate

original: viśvasyāsya viviktaye sthiradhiyo ye saṃrabhante punaḥ tān abhyarthayituṃ mayaiṣa vihito mūrdhnā praṇāmādaraḥ //15//
analyzed: viśvasya asya viviktaye sthira dhiyaḥ ye saṃrabhante punar tān abhyarthayitum mayā eṣa vihitaḥ mūrdhnā praṇāma ādaraḥ

original: bhrāmyanto bhramayanti mandadhiṣaṇās te jantucakraṃ jaḍaṃ svātmīkṛtya guṇābhidhānavasato baddhvā dṛḍhaṃ bandhanaiḥ /
analyzed: bhrāmyantaḥ bhramayanti manda dhiṣaṇāḥ te jantu cakram jaḍam svātmīkṛtya guṇa abhidhāna vasataḥ baddhvā dṛḍham bandhanaiḥ

original: dṛṣṭvetthaṃ gurubhāravāhavidhaye yātānuyātān pasūn tatpāśapravikartanāya ghaṭitaṃ jñānatriśūlaṃ mayā //16//
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ittham guru bhāra vāha vidhaye yāta anuyātān pasūn tad pāśa pravikartanāya ghaṭitam jñāna triśūlam mayā

original: bahubhir api so 'ham eva bhramitas tattvopadeśakaṃmanyaiḥ /
analyzed: bahubhiḥ api saḥ ham eva bhramitaḥ tattva upadeśa kaṃmanyaiḥ

original: tattvam iti varṇayugam api yeṣāṃ rasanā na pasparśa //17//
analyzed: tattvam iti varṇa yugam api yeṣām rasanā na pasparśa

original: śrīmān devaḥ śaṃbhur mām iyati niyuktavāṃs tattve //18//
analyzed: śrīmān devaḥ śaṃbhuḥ mām iyati niyuktavān tattve
tad tattva nirmala sthiti vibhāgi hṛdaye svayam praviṣṭam iva
śrī somānanda matam vimṛśya mayā nibaddham idam
haṃho hṛd cakra cāra pravicaraṇa lasat nirbhara ānanda pūrṇāḥ devyaḥ smad pāśa koṭi pravighaṭana paṭu jñāna śūla ūrdhva dhārāḥ

original: cetovākkāyam etad vigatabhavabhayotpatti yuṣmāsu samyak protaṃ yat tena mahyaṃ vrajata kila hṛdi drāk prasādaṃ prasahya //20//
analyzed: cetaḥ vāc kāyam etat vigata bhava bhaya utpatti yuṣmāsu samyak protam yat tena mahyam vrajata kila hṛdi drāk prasādam prasahya

original: vyākhyādikarmaparipāṭipade niyukto yuṣmābhir asmi gurubhāvam anupraviśya /
analyzed: vyākhyā ādi karma paripāṭi pade niyuktaḥ yuṣmābhiḥ asmi guru bhāvam anupraviśya

original: vākcittacāpalam idaṃ mama tena devyās taccakracāracaturasthitayaḥ kṣamadhvam // 21//
analyzed: vāc citta cāpalam idam mama tena devyāḥ tad cakra cāra catura sthitayaḥ kṣamadhvam
samāptam idam para triṃśikā tattva vivaraṇam
śataiḥ ekonaviṃśatyā triṃśikā iyam vivecitā
sarveṣu trika śāstreṣu granthīḥ nirdalayiṣyati
kṛtiḥ abhinavaguptasya
